metadata.title: CVE-2022-48749 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/msm/dpu: invalid parameter check in dpu_setup_dspp_pcc  The function performs a check on the "ctx" input parameter, however, it is used before the check.  Initialize the "base" variable after the sanity check to avoid a possible NULL pointer dereference.  Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493866 ("Null pointer dereference")
